text: Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is an airport near Washington, D.C.. It is in Arlington County, Virginia. It is the commercial airport closest to Washington, D.C. The Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority (MWAA) is in control of the airport. It is named after 40th President of the United States Ronald Reagan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Washington National Airport Category:Airports in Virginia Category:Arlington County, Virginia Category:1926 establishments in the United States Category:20th- century establishments in Virginia
title: Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport
